Name: Layla
Introduction: Layla is the princess of a small country and loved it ever since she was born. Layla loves to dress up and is very conscious about her appearance.

EvilList.title: Bathing with milk every day.
EvilList.explain: Who are you to ask me these questions?

EvilList.title: Slapped the neighboring princess across the face in public.
EvilList.explain: That stupid woman actually said I had plastic surgery.

EvilList.title: Yelling at the servants.
EvilList.explain: They should’ve done their job properly.

EndingHeaven: Why can you decide where I go, even though your decision isn’t wrong.
